original_text:
though his hatred be covered with deception,
    his wickedness will be exposed in the assembly.
korean_text: 속임으로 그 미움을 감출지라도 그의 악이 회중 앞에 드러나리라

sentences.original_text: though his hatred be covered with deception
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그의 미움이 속임수로 덮여 있을지라도

sentences.original_text: his wickedness will be exposed in the assembly.
